import "./ProjectSlide.css" import unshore from "../Images/unshoreLogo2.png"; function ProjectSlide() { return(

post.postTitle

post.postContent...Unshore was a great game to work on for my first project in Falmouth University’s Games Academy. Taking the role of UI Programmer was a great chance to to have some some fun in the Unity game engine whilst being part of a multifaceted team. The theme we were given was Cornwall and “a famous dead person”, we figured that a dark horror styled game of chasing evil piskies around the island of Saint Michaels Mount while being hunted by King Arthurs ghost was pretty bang on.

posted by Danny Daley on 29 Jan 2021 in Games, Projects

) } export default ProjectSlide;
